description: Try our easy to follow Vanilla Bean Sheet Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vanilla Bean Sheet Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using excess parchment as handles, remove cooled cake from pan. Using an offset spatula, spread Vanilla Bean Swiss Meringue Buttercream onto cake, swirling as desired. Garnish with sprinkles, if desired.
